dialogue: Do you have any shirts with good reviews?
There are three shirts on the display table: a blue and white, a brown, and a grey and brown.
Do you have anything with a similar size as the brown shirt and the grey and brown?
I have that grey and brown shirt, as well as the blue and white one on the table and the grey and black on the wall.
Do you have the cost and size of the blue and white shirt and the grey and black?
The former is an XXL costing 24.99. The latter is a S running 74.99.
I'll take them both.
Of course. I'll add them both now.
Can I get two of the blue and white shirt?
Yes, I'll update your cart for you.
Do you have any XL dresses?
I have a black dress in XL on the left, what do you think?
Can I see other options?
There no other dresses to show you.
Please show me some blouses.
What do you think of the white and black blouse, the black blouse, or the light grey blouse?
I want a tank top that will go best with my wardrobe. Which of these will do the trick?
You may take a look at the yellow and white tank top that matches your criteria.
How highly rated is that one?
Which item?
The light grey blouse in the second cubicle.
It has a score of 2.9.
Now tell me how it compares with the white and black blouse.
The white and black blouse has a score of 3.7 while the other has a score of 2.9.
Is there anything else like the light grey blouses you can show me? Similar price and customer review scores.
Yes, there are, all of which you have seen already, including the white and black blouse and the black blouse.
Okay now show me some jeans with good review scores.
There are several, all of which are dark blue.
Show me something that has the same customer review score as the dark blue jeans on the very left of the right closet.
I will refer you to the other dark blue jeans in the room.
What are the available sizes and the size of the blouse on the rack?
Which one?
The white and grey blouse on the rack in the middle of the room.
It is available in XS, M, XL, and S and is in size S.
Can you help me find a yellow and white tank top with good reviews?
What do you think of the yellow and white tank hanging in the middle?
Do you have any long-sleeved blouses with diamond patterns?
How about the black blouse to the left of the tank top?
Will you add the two light grey blouses to my cart?
Of course. Both items have been added.
Do you have the brand and available sizes of those?
Which items do you mean?
The two light grey blouses on either end of the shelf.
Both are size M and from Brain Puzzles.
I'll take another of each, please.
Of course. I've updated the quantities in your cart.
Do you have any sleeveless dresses?
I have two in purple and one in dark pink. What do you think?
I need a sweater. What do you have?
Here's a black one, what do you think?
I need a solid color hoodie from 212 Local.
Here's a brown one on the far left, check it out.
Do you know the price of the brown hoodie?
Sorry, which one?
The brown hoodie. How much is it?
It's listed for $144.99.
Let's add size M and expensive to that search.
Sorry, a search with those criteria returned nothing.
I'll take that brown hoodie and that first sweater I looked at.
I'll get both of those to your cart.
Do you have other sweaters with good ratings?
I have this festive holiday sweater in  the third cubicle on the right, would you consider it?
Hi. I want to see your sweaters.
You should take a look at the pink sweater on the left, the brown sweater in the middle, and the green sweater on the right.
Can you tell me the difference between the pink sweater and the green sweater?
The pink sweater is a L and the green is a S.
OK. Maybe you could show me affordable sweaters with a healthy rating?
Doesn't look like we have anything like that. Is there something else I can help you find?
Yes. Can you show me a dress with a plain pattern?
Right. That would be the purple sweater you saw.
Can you recommend a T-shirt?
Sure. We have the violet sweater on the right, the black tshirt hanging up, or the yellow tshirt on the left.
Actually, can you show me well-rating tank tops?
What do you think of the yellow, white tank top?
Can you tell me the size and available sizes of the tank top you have over there?
Which one are you referring to?
I'm looking for some nice tops I could wear for a job interview.  What could you show me?
In the second cabinet I have the light gray top, another light gray one in the third cabinet, and for some seasonal flair, facing the door on the garment rack, I have maroon Christmas sweater.
I'd like the size and rating for the pants.
Which pair are you asking about?
I mean the gray ones in the second cabinet.
Those are an XS, and have a 3.5 rating.
Sounds great, I'll go with those.
Nice choice, I'll add them to your cart.
I'd also like to see some sneakers, if you have any you'd suggest.
I've got the gray pair in the rightmost cabinet.
You know, I like those gray pants so much, I want a second pair.  Could you update my cart?
I'll add a second pair of them for you now.
I'm also interested in taking a look at some half-sleeve shirts.
In the bottom middle of the left wall I have that black shirt, as well as the pink and white striped shirt in the middle cabinet on the right wall.
Have you got anything like the black and olive dress at the far left of the dress stand, but made by New Fashion?
I don't have any dresses like that.  Could I help you find something else?
Can you tell me the size and price of the shirts?
Which two are you talking about?
The black one on the left wall, and the pink and white one in the cabinet, I mean.
The black one is XL and costs 84.99, the pink and white one is M and costs 34.99.
Do you have any well rated tee shirts?
I have this pink and white one in the second cubicle, what do you think?
How abpout some shoes?
I have a pair in  the second and fourth cubicles at the bottom, do you prefer either?
Do you have anything in velvet?
I'm sorry, no.
Let me get the third one in the third cubicle please.
I'll get that in your cart.
Let me get two of them please.
Of course, I'll take care of that for you.
How about a tee shirt?
I've got this one on the right, do you like it?
What are the ratings for the last one in the sixth cubicle and the one on the right side of the first carousel?  And do you know what sizes are available?
The one in the cubicle has a 3.5 rating and comes in XL and M, while the one on the floor stand has a 4.9 rating and comes inn S, XL, M, L, XS, and XXL.
What about the jacket, what is the cost of that?
Sorry, which one?
The last one in the sixth cubicle.
It retails for $199.99.
Which jacket in this room fits my current style?
I would consider the red and white one in the middle of the top row on the wall rack.
What's the size range on that dress, actually
I am sorry, could you help me find the dress you are interested in?
Yeah, I am looking at the purple dress in the middle of the bottom row on the wall rack.
Thanks! This dress is in stock in XS, S, M, XL, and XXL.
Let's narrow the results down to the brand The Vegan Baker and long sleeves.
Unfortunately, no long sleeve jackets from this brand are available.
That's OK. Do you have a nice jacket from Downtown Stylists?
I can offer you the brown jacket on the right.  What do you think?
Let's try something else. I'd like to see something from the same brand as the pink dress and purple dress on the floor rack on the left, but in red and white.
Unfortunately, I have no similar items in those colors.
That's OK. What good jeans do you have?
I have one dark blue model in the cupboard on the left and two more in the one on the right, also in dark blue.
Please help me find a Coats & More jacket in extra small.
Are you into that red and white one hanging against the wall up top?
In fact, I really want a red and white jacket.
Well fantastic! That red and white jacket in the back right should be a perfect match.

I'm really picky, and that one isn't totally cutting it for me. This dark pink dress on the right looks acceptable though, and I could maybe put that black and olive dress on the bottom row in the back right to use. Can you tell me about those dresses please?

The pink dress is available in more sizes. I can offer you that dress in extra small, small, medium, large, and extra extra large, whereas the black and olive dress currently only comes in extra small.
Well that's no problem, because that's exactly the size I need. Please put that black and olive dress in my cart, and add in that studded black tank on top.
You have excellent taste! I'll put those items in your cart right away.
How much is that one hanging on the wall?
Sorry, I'm not sure which item you're talking about. Could you please give a more detailed description of it?
Yeah it's that black tank top on the top right end of the rack hanging in the back against the wall.
That tank top costs $19.99.
Alright thanks for that. Moving on... do you happen to see a good jacket that doesn't cost very much?
Would you consider the light grey one on this rack up front to the right?
I'd like to see some blouses, please.
I've got the red and yellow one in the top middle of the wall, and the violet one at the lower right.
Okay, cool, I'll take the violet one.  And that green sweater on the table at the bottom middle.
I'll add the sweater and blouse to your cart now.
Have you got any tees with a good rating in yellow?
I do!  There's the yellow one at the top left as well as the one next to it.
Any others?
No, I don't have any additional yellow tees  with a good rating.
Add another of that violet blouse to my cart, if you don't mind.
Not a problem!
Have you got any jackets I could see?
On the wall in the top middle I have that red and white varsity jacket.
How are the ratings of those two dresses?
Which dresses are you asking about?
Have you got any dark blue jeans I could look at?
I've got the dark blue pair in the second cabinet, another pair to the right of the mirror, and a third dark blue pair next to them.
Have you got anything in XS with a plain pattern?
I don't happen to have and plain patterned dark blue jeans.
Can I get the rating and size range for the pair in the second cabinet, and the dark blue pair furthest to the right?
Both have a 4.7 and come in XL, S, XS, XXL, M.
Can you tell me the available sizes and brand of the jeans?
For which pair?
For the pair furthest to the right.
Those are made by Modern Arts and come in XL, S, XS, XXL, M.
Can I get the brand and available sizes of the pair in the second cabinet and the ones to the right of the mirror?
Both are made by Modern Arts and come in XL, S, XS, XXL, M.
Have you got any plain jackets I could see today?
In the leftmost cabinet, I have that brown jacket.
Do you have any shirts?
I have these in the third and fifth spots on the back table and the brown one on the front table. Do any of these strike your fancy?
The two shirts come in what sizes?  How much do they cost?
Sorry, which one?
The two on the tables, the striped one and the brown one in front.
The striped one is $69.99 and comes in XS, XXL, L, M, S, and L. The brown one is $89.99 and comes in XL, XS, and L.
Let me get the yellow one on the left end in back.
i'll put that in your cart.
Do you have any long sleeve blouses with good ratings?
How about this one in the center of the top row? Does it interest you?
Could you suggest some affordable shirts?
We have these two, the third and  fifth ones on the back table, which you've seen,  and the one on the wall on the top right, which you haven't. Take a look.
Do you have any dresses by Modern Arts?
We have this purple one in the center of the bottom row on the wall and the last one on the floor stand on the right.
Do you have any shoe suggestions?
What do you think of the black and white shoes on the left and the grey on the right?
How much are these shoes and who makes them?
Which shoes do you mean?
The black and white ones on the left and the grey and the right.
The former are from Art Den and they run 54.99. The latter are from The Vegan Baker and they cost 64.99.
I'll take the grey ones, please.
No problem, I'll add those to your cart.
Can I see some XS pants?
I have two pairs of grey pants on the shelf. What do you thnk?
I'll take another pair of those grey shoes as well as the grey pants on the right.
Sure thing, I've updated your cart for you.
Can I see some well-rated coats?
What do you think of the black coat on the left?
What can you tell me about the yellow t-shirt straight ahead and the black on the right?
The yellow is a design pattern t-shirt from Brian Puzzles that comes in S and L. The black is a design pattern t-shirt from North Lodge that is available in L, XL, M, and S.
Which of the shirts goes best with my other clothes?
What do you think of the grey and brown shirt on the display table?
xxxx
Which do you mean?
I'd like to see some small blouses.
Do you like the white and black one hanging up top on the wall, the white and black one in the second cubby back or the black one next to it? They are all small.
Can you tell me the sizes and prices for the two pairs of grey pants in the bottom cubbies?
Both of these pairs of pants are extra small and cost $189.99.
Do you have any other options like the white and black blouse in the cubby or the white and black one up on the wall?
I have those two white and black blouses and the white and red one by the mirror.
Any cheap dresses?
Do you like the purple dress on the bottom of the wall. It is a cheap dress.
I'll buy the grey pants to the left.
Ok. I'll put them in your cart for you.
Can you recommend a dress to match the rest of my clothes?
Do you like the black dress in the second cubby from the mirror, the dark pink one on the front left rack, or the black and olive dress hanging on the bottom left of the wall?
Can you compare the dark pink one with the black one?
The dark pink one is plain. The black one is velvet.
Can you show me a knit blouse by StyleNow Feed?
I have the black one hanging in the third cubby from the mirror.
Any other options?
I'm sorry, that's all I have. Can I get you something different?
HI, do you have any hoodies with full-length sleeves?
Sure, what do you think of the brown hoodie hanging up right at the back?
It's ok.  What do you have in size L with a dotted pattern?
Sorry, I don't have any dotted hoodies at the moment.
That's ok, I really love this red and white jacket right up front.  Can you put it in my cart please?
Of course!  It's in your cart now.
Do you have anything similar to that?
The bright blue jacket on the same round rack as that one is pretty similar.
I love it too, I'll take it!  I'm also going to get another red and white one for my brother.
Perfect, I've put two more jackets in your cart.  Anything else I can do?
Do you have any affordable priced blouses?
I have a few hanging up in front of you.  Starting on the left is a black blouse with white dots.   Moving left, you can see a light grey blouse.  Over at the far left is a black blouse as well.
How much is that other black item?
Which one?
Recommend me a coat, please.
What do you think of the black coats in the room?
Add the one in the back left closet to my cart.
Okay, that coat will be added to your cart.
What else do you have that have the same sleeve length as those black coats but that are expensive and in black and white?
Sorry, but no matches were found.
Okay, pull some joggers up.
What do you think of the dark green joggers on the left side of the room?
Add the black coat to my cart. The one on the right side of the room.
Okay, it will be added.
Now show me some jeans from Modern Arts that are in size XS.
What do you think of the dark blue jeans in the second row of the closet?
what are the available sizes of the tops?
Which blouses are you referring to?
I mean the white, red, and violet blouse on the  right of the closet and the white and black blouse in the second cubicle of the closet.
The first is available in XXL, L, and XL and is 64.99. The other is available in S, M, XL, L, and XS and is 19.99.
What else do you have that has good customer review scores?
Sorry, but no matches were found. What else can I do you for?
Have you got any dresses I could see?
I have the black dress in the second cabinet.
Have you got anything in the same size range as that?
It doesn't appear that I do.
How about showing me some pants?
I've got the gray ones at the far left, the gray ones in the third cabinet, and the gray ones in the far right cabinet.
I'll take the pair at the far right, as well as the pink and white shirt in the second cabinet.
I'll add the pants and shirt to your cart.
Have you got any shoes to show me?
I've got the black pair in the second cabinet, the gray pair in the fourth cabinet, and the gold pair in the far right cabinet.
How about showing me some blazers?
I've got the brown one in the far left cabinet, and also the light gray one in the second cabinet.
Have you got any in black and white with horizontal stripes?
No, I don't happen to have any in black and white with stripes.
Show me what you have for hoodies please.
Here's a brown one and a green one.
Tell me more about those two.
One is green and one is brown.
Do you have anything like the green one in terms of sleeve length and price?
I just have those two that I showed you already.
Ok, what sizes are available for the light blue jeans and dark ones?
Which ones?
The jeans on the sides of the room.
The ones on the right are a L and they only come in L.  The ones on the left are XS and they come in XS, S, M, XL, and XXL.
I'll take both of those.
Great, I'll add them to your cart.
Which blouse do you recommend?
I have a light gray one, black one, and white and black one.  Do you like any of those?
Do you have any nice pants for me to look at?
How do you like these options?
Any more hoodies from Downtown Consignment in green?
Here is one I found.
Do you have something else?
I donâ€™t have any more hoodies from Downtown Consignment. Is there anything else I could help you find?
Can you tell me how the grey pants compare with the other grey ones?
The ones on the right cost 189.99 and the other ones cost 244.99.
Please add the second ones to my cart.
I will do that now.
Do you have any nice sleeveless tank tops?
I have this yellow one.
Not my color but it's nice. How much is the pair of blue jeans?
Which ones are you referring to?
I mean these dark blue jeans on the bottom right.
They cost 184.99.
Iâ€™ll take them!
Have been added to your cart.
Are there any  good t-shirts?
What do you think of the pink and white one?
Go to coats. What do you have?
There is a brown coat, a black coat, and a light grey one, all of which I recommend. What do you think?
Compare on available sizes and price the brown coat and the light grey coat, please.
The brown coat is available in S and XL and is 59.99. The other is available in M, XL, XXL, XS, L, and S and is 179.99.
xxxx
Please specify which items you are referring to.
I mean the brown coat on the very far left and the light grey coat in the shelf to its right.
The first is available in S and XL. The other is available in M, XL, XXL, XS, L, and S.
Add the brown coat to my cart, please.
Confirmed. The coat will be added to your cart.
Now tell me if you see any cheap dresses.
There are two purple dresses which match your criteria: against the wall and on the rack.
Any with good customer review scores?
Sorry, no.
Okay, tell me the price and size for each of the purple dresses.
The dress on the wall is 24.99 and is XXL. The other on the rack is 24.99  and is in XXL.
That's fine. I want the red and white jacket in my cart, please.
Okay, it will be added.
Show me shoes from Global Voyager.
I have a golden pair.
Which jacket do you recommend for me?
Check out this gray one, red and white one, or black one.
I'll take the gray one and the red and white one.
Ok, I'll add them to your cart.
I'd like to narrow down the results to items with good ratings from Downtown Consignment.
I don't have anything like that.
Ok then, I'll take the red and white jacket and the red, white, and yellow blouse.
I'll add those to your cart.
Do you have any jackets I might like?
Here are two black ones you should look at.
Who makes the grey jacket and in what sizes?
Which one?
The light gray one on the rack in front.
It's from 212 Local and comes in S, XL, and XXL.
I'd like to see items in L.
I don't have any coats in L.
Can you help me find a hoodie?
Let me know how you feel about the brown hoodie on the right or the green hoodie on the center rack.
What are the prices of the two coats?
Sorry, which items are you interested in?
The black coat hanging next to the brown jacket on the right and the black jacket next to the white and grey top on the left.
The one on the right is 179.99 and the one on the left is 139.99
Do you have any ideas on what to look at?
Sorry I don't see anymore hoodies.
I'll take the black coat on the left and the brown hoodie on the right.
Okay. I've added the coat and the hoodie to your cart.
I'll take another of that hoodie.
Okay. I added a second hoodie.
Any sweaters in hear that you think I'd like?
Take a look at the red and white sweater on the left.
Any good jeans to rec?
Sure, the blue jeans in the second, fifth, and sixth slots from the left might catch your eye.
Love the first. Love the third. I'll take both.
Alright, I'll add both of those for you.
How much do they cost, and what size are they?
The ones you already added to your cart?
Yeah.
They are both XS and cost $184.99.
Any cheap jeans that are XS?
I didn't find any extra ones to show.
Well, I'll take another pair of the third pair from earlier.
You got it, adding now.
So which tanktop would go best with the jeans?
How about that yellow and white tank in the top left?
I'm trying to find a black jacket.
There's a jacket in that color hanging behind the pink and white striped shirt on those shelves against the wall.
Wow, that was easy! Are you able to add that to my cart?
Certainly! I will add that black jacket to your cart right now.
Now can I have you search for something sleeveless that comes in small?
Sadly, there is not a single sleeveless black jacket in that size.
Okay. Surely you can find a nice blouse in extra large?
The short-sleeved purple and white top straight ahead comes in that size, as do the two black blouses one cubby to the left. Any interest in those?
I'd like you to put another one of those black jackets in my cart please. I have a friend who will love it.
Okay! I will put another black jacket in your cart.
Do you think any of these blouses would look good with other clothes I wear a lot?

I advise you to consider the white and grey short-sleeved blouse on this rack up front, the black blouse to the back of that same rack, and the black and white tank top hanging on the end of the top row against the wall in the back right.
These look like they might be beyond my budget. What can you show me that won't break the bank?

See if you like that black blouse on the left behind the argyle shirt, the purple tank top at the far end of the bottom row in the back left, or the long-sleeved blouse with the bright colors in the row above that.
What sizes do those jeans come in and what size am I looking at?
Which pants precisely?
Oh sorry the two grey pairs on the right.
Both of those are extra smalls, and that is the only size currently in stock for them.
Do you have a long sleeved blouse with spots?
Sorry i can't find anything like that?
Do you have any blouses in size S?
Take a look at this black blouse at the left of the display and the white and black blouse on the right of the display.
Do they have the same brand?
The black blouse is from Art News Today and the white and black one is from Downtown Consignment.
Can you add the white and black blouse and the black one to my cart?
Sure I'll add both blouses.
Actually can you add another of both blouses to my cart?
Sure thing.
I need cheap shoes.
How about the grey ones at the bottom of the shelf?
What size are those two blouses on the right?
Which blouses are you referring to?
Do you have any black sweaters with good reviews?
What do you think of this one on the right side of the third cubicle?
I need a tank top from Cats Are Great with good ratings.
The second one in the third cubicle fits those criteria, have a look.
Do you know the price and size of that sweater?
Sorry, which one?
The black one and then the light grey one.
The first one is shown in size S and sells for $59.99 and the second is size M and retails for $39.99.
Let me get the grey one.
You bet, I'll get that in your cart for you.
Let's refine my search to include size S.
I'm sorry, I found no matches.
How about some trousers with good ratings?
I have the first and third ones on the bottom right and the last one on the bottom left.
How about a blouse?
We've got these two on the front left of the carousel and one in the closest cubicle in the center row on the right.
Which has the better rating: the black one on the floor or the one in the cubicle?
The one on the carousel has a 4.7 rating, the other one a 3.1.
What's the brand on those blouses?
Sorry, which one?
What can you show me for 212 Local hoodies with full-length sleeves?
I have this brown hoodie on the right wall, in the third cubby from the right. What do you think of that?
It's alright, but do you have anything else to show me?
I'm afraid not at the moment. Could I help you with something else?
Yeah, I want something like that brown hoodie, but with really nice reviews.
Ok, in addition to that brown hoodie, I do also have this green hoodie on the left side of the front floor rack.
Great! Could you compare ratings and sizing options on those?
Of course! The brown hoodie comes in S, XL, and XXL and has a 4.0 rating, while the green hoodie comes in S through L and has a rating of just 2.8.
Alright, I'll think about those. In the meantime, I've been eyeing those dark blue jeans down there on the right and I've decided I want them. Please toss those in my cart!
Sure thing, I'll do so now!
Great! Do you have any other jeans you think might go well with my closet?
Sure, how about these other dark blue jeans on the right wall here?
Those look promising! What brand are they?
Which item are you referring to?
Let's see some blouses.
Are you a fan of either of the two colorful ones to the far right or the other colorful one on the left end of that same set of shelves?
What are the sizes for those blouses?
Could you be more precise about which items you are seeking information on?
Oh my bad. I want to know the sizes of the long-sleeved blouses on the far right and far left of that set of shelves on the right.
The blouse on the far right is a small, while the blouse on the far left is a medium.
I can wear both of those sizes. Okay, please add both of those to my cart.
You got it! I will put those long-sleeved blouses in your cart right now.
Can you see if there is anything in red and white by the brand Coats & More?
I apologize, but I do not see a single red and white blouse by that brand.
Aw man well go ahead and get me one of those blouses hanging to the right of the red and white jacket on the right.
Okay! I'll add that blouse to your cart.
Can I have you look for a pair of blue trousers in extra extra large around here?
The dark pair on the right is available in extra extra large. Can you see yourself wearing those?
I like that second pair of blue jeans in the back left better. Get me a pair of those please, and grab me one of those brown hoodies on the right while you're at it.
Okay! Those items will be added to your cart shortly.
Is there anything else in the same pattern as those funky multicolored shirts from before that were on the far right of that set of shelves? It would have to come in extra extra large.
There is a shirt with the same pattern in the front of that circular rack in the back of the store.
What else can you show me?
That is the only option I could find. Is there something else you'd like me to assist with?
Keep me posted if you see some cool hoodies.
There's a great solid green hoodie on the rack right up front and center and a great brown option hanging on the shelves to the right over the pair of blue jeans.
I appreciate that. Now I'd like to hear what sizes that long-sleeved shirt over there comes in.
I'm not sure which shirt you're referring to. Can you please describe it in more depth?
It's on that second rack in the back, right behind a bright blue jacket on the left-hand side. I think it's got some kind of floral pattern in white and grey colors.
That white and grey blouse is offered in extra small, small, medium, and extra large.
Cool go ahead and throw that in the cart.
Will do!
Got any other suggestions?
Unfortunately, that's all I've got for hoodies.
Alright, well those grey pants up front on the right look decent. Can you add those to my cart please?
Certainly! I'll get that taken care of.
And maybe now you've got some ideas for a dress?
See if any of those dresses hanging against the wall on the bottom row catch your eye.
I'll give those some thought. Now can I set you to work looking for a good coat?
